thread.title: Summer Music Festivals for All Tastes

author: Gareth Vipers
title: Summer Music Festivals for All Tastes

organizations.name: boston calling may 25-27 harvard athletic complex

text:
Over the past few years the music industry has tried to reinvent the live experience, bringing in corporate tie-ups, building buzz with intimate secret shows and introducing special VIP fan packages that can run to thousands of dollars. For those wanting to get back to basics, we’ve rounded up five top music festivals this summer, from the easy urban day trip to the full camping experience.
If you don’t feel like camping…
Boston Calling May 25-27 Harvard Athletic Complex, Boston Three-day tickets from $289; single-day...
